name: @stjude/proteinpaint
description: a genomics visualization tool for exploring a cohort's genotype and phenotype data

scripts.predev: if [[ -d ./client ]]; then node ./client/test/import-specs.js name=? && rm -f ../public/bin/*proteinpaint.js; fi
scripts.start: ./build/dev/resetBundles.sh && nodemon server/server.js --watch serverconfig.json --watch ./server/server*.js* --watch server/genome --watch server/dataset --watch server/src/test/routes
scripts.dev1: trap 'kill %1' INT; webpack --config=./webpack.config.js --env NODE_ENV=development --watch --color & npm start
scripts.server: trap 'kill %1' INT; npm run dev -w @stjude/proteinpaint-server & npm start
scripts.test:integration: webpack --config=./webpack.config.js && npm run ci-pp-server && sleep 10 && npm run test:integration --workspace=client
